title: Prime Location - Brand New Apt 298 High Level Rd
details:
Brand New 2bed/2bath luxury apt for sale in prime location.

Located on the 5th floor with unobstructed view of the city. Apt faces a quiet street with picture windows and balconies for bedrooms and living room.

Small size apt building well maintained. 7 floors and 5 apt on each floor.

Common Amenities
Club House/Roof Top Terrace
Pool
24 hour security
covered car port
